title: Strengthening Programming Practice Competencies: Inclusive Education for Students with Disabilities in Online Higher Education: UDL/UID

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogy and understanding of online learning environments
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will analyze and present at least three accessibility elements of online learning environments based on UDL/UID principles.

Learners, in teams, can develop a blended lesson design plan for students with disabilities (one or more types: visual, auditory, physical) and submit a presentation meeting the following criteria: 1) application of three UDL principles, 2) integration of two or more technology accessibility tools, 3) a 15-minute presentation with a 5-minute Q&A session.
Learners will apply strategies to strengthen social connections using ICT tools in actual educational cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
